author: antelder
msg: Add Hazelcast registry in to the build

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1674 Modified to attach Exception received from a Delegate to the CAS CacheEntry. This is later used to inform the client of a problem while processing input CAS.

author: henrib
msg: Refactored to to run multi-threaded; this verifies the expression cache and volatile AST node cache usage do not induce errors.

author: adrianc
msg: Fixed a bug in TemporalExpressions.Union where the next(Calendar cal) method returned the next date found in the union, not the next chronological date.

author: tomwhite
msg: HADOOP-6408. Add a /conf servlet to dump running configuration. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.
